mapper.select: select email from userinfo where name=#{name}

select usetable.email,phone,name,department,timed,uses,systemType,configuration,inPortTrue,outPortTrue,inIp,outIp,location,machineName,note,state from userinfo left join usetable on userinfo.email=usetable.email where state=1 or state=3

select usetable.email,phone,name,department,timed,uses,systemType,configuration,inPortTrue,outPortTrue,inIp,outIp,location,machineName,note,state from userinfo left join usetable on userinfo.email=usetable.email where state=#{state}

select usetable.email,userinfo.phone,userinfo.name,userinfo.department,time,timed,uses,systemType,configuration,temPort,location,machineName,inIp,domainName from usetable,userinfo where usetable.email=#{email} and usetable.email=userinfo.email and machineName=#{machineName} limit 1
mapper.delete: delete from usetable where email=#{email} and inIp=#{inIp} and outIp=#{outIp} and inPortTrue=#{inPortTrue} and outPortTrue=#{outPortTrue}
